DataElement.preferredName: Hospital Intensive Care Unit Admission Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date of admitting into an intensive care unit (a health care facility unit that provides intensive care to critically ill patients and patients with complex medical problems who require constant monitoring or special therapy) of a hospital.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to an admission into an intensive care unit (a health care facility unit that provides intensive care to critically ill patients and patients with complex medical problems who require constant monitoring or special therapy) of a hospital.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.

Concepts.definition: An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.

Property.preferredDefinition: A health care facility unit that provides intensive care to critically ill patients and patients with complex medical problems who require constant monitoring or special therapy.:The condition of being allowed to enter.

Concepts.definition: A health care facility unit that provides intensive care to critically ill patients and patients with complex medical problems who require constant monitoring or special therapy.
The condition of being allowed to enter; the activity of admitting someone to something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
